mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Partial Personal from Snowville
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, partial personal letter, April 10, 1861, to "Dr." from Snowville, Va, this portion unsigned but handwriting matches his Father-in-Law - Thomas G. Shelor who lived in Snowville, 1 original piece, 2 written pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
